title: Mitigating Biases for Instruction-following Language Models via Bias Neurons Elimination
details: N Yang, T Kang, SJ Choi, H Lee, K Jung - Proceedings of the 62nd Annual Meeting of …, 2024
abstract: Instruction-following language models often show undesirable biases. These undesirable biases may be accelerated in the real-world usage of language models, where a wide range of instructions is used through zero-shot example prompting. To …
